title.rendered: “IDF and Shin Bet Neutralize Key Terrorist in Tulkarem: A Strategic Strike Against Violence”

content.rendered:
Joint message from the IDF Spokesperson and the Shin Bet Spokesperson:

*The IDF and Shin Bet eliminated a terrorist involved in the terror organization in the Tulkarem area of Menashe, who was responsible for several shooting attacks and explosives in the seam zone.*

In a joint operation by the IDF and Shin Bet, a apartment of wanted individuals in Tulkarem within the Menashe Brigade was attacked, where Sa’id Jaber, a terrorist operative who directed terrorist plots and was involved in a series of shooting attacks and bombings against civilians and IDF forces in the Tulkarem area, was present. He was also involved in planning additional attacks and establishing terrorist infrastructure.

In the last week, the wanted individuals neutralized in the apartment were involved in carrying out shooting attacks and attempted attacks using explosives in the seam zone, including near the settlement of Bat Hefer. Moreover, the terror organization is connected to the terrorists involved in the attack in Qalqilya in which Amnon Mukhtar, may his memory be a blessing, was murdered.

The apartment where the terrorists were neutralized served as a base for planning terrorist activities, preparing explosives, and providing shelter for the wanted individuals.

Attached is documentation from the attack: https://bit.ly/3RL0pXV
